info.updatedServerCount: Updated server count. Connected to {SERVER_COUNT} total servers.

error.retrieveShards: An error occurred while retrieving which shards to spawn.
error.managerSpawningShards: An error occurred while spawning shards.
error.managerShardInfo: An error occurred while retrieving shard info.
error.commandAction: An error occurred while running a command action.
error.commandActionNotFound: Could not find a command with the name '{COMMAND_NAME}'.
error.commandActionRenameMissingArg: Please supply the current command name and new command name.
error.commandActionDeleteMissingArg: Please supply a command name to delete.
error.clientLogin: An error occurred while the client attempted to login.
error.job: An error occurred while running the '{JOB}' job.
error.updatedServerCountSite: An error occurred while updating the server count on '{BOT_SITE}'.
error.guildJoin: An error occurred while processing a guild join.
error.guildLeave: An error occurred while processing a guild leave.
error.message: An error occurred while processing a message.
error.reaction: An error occurred while processing a reaction.
error.command: An error occurred while processing a command interaction.
error.voice: An error occurred while processing a voice interaction.
error.button: An error occurred while processing a button interaction.
error.commandNotFound: [{INTERACTION_ID}] A command with the name '{COMMAND_NAME}' could not be found.
error.autocompleteNotFound: [{INTERACTION_ID}] An autocomplete method for the '{COMMAND_NAME}' command could not be found.
error.commandGuild: [{INTERACTION_ID}] An error occurred while executing the '{COMMAND_NAME}' command for user '{USER_TAG}' ({USER_ID}) in channel '{CHANNEL_NAME}' ({CHANNEL_ID}) in guild '{GUILD_NAME}' ({GUILD_ID}).
error.autocompleteGuild: [{INTERACTION_ID}] An error occurred while autocompleting the '{OPTION_NAME}' option for the '{COMMAND_NAME}' command for user '{USER_TAG}' ({USER_ID}) in channel '{CHANNEL_NAME}' ({CHANNEL_ID}) in guild '{GUILD_NAME}' ({GUILD_ID}).
error.commandOther: [{INTERACTION_ID}] An error occurred while executing the '{COMMAND_NAME}' command for user '{USER_TAG}' ({USER_ID}).
error.autocompleteOther: [{INTERACTION_ID}] An error occurred while autocompleting the '{OPTION_NAME}' option for the '{COMMAND_NAME}' command for user '{USER_TAG}' ({USER_ID}).
error.voiceEventGuild: An error occurred while executing the voice event '{EVENT_NAME}' command for user '{USER_TAG}' ({USER_ID}) in channel '{CHANNEL_NAME}' ({CHANNEL_ID}) in guild '{GUILD_NAME}' ({GUILD_ID}).
error.apiRequest: An error occurred while processing a '{HTTP_METHOD}' request to '{URL}'.
error.apiRateLimit: A rate limit was hit while making a request.
error.sqliteConnect: An error occurred while connecting to the SQLite database.
error.sqliteMigration: An error occurred while applying migration {MIGRATION_NAME} to the SQLite database.
error.queryServerGet: An error occurred while querying server {GUILD_ID}.
error.queryServerLogChannel: An error occurred while setting the server {GUILD_ID} with log channel {CHANNEL_ID}.
error.queryStatsUserInGuild: An error occurred while querying user {USER_ID} stats in guild {GUILD_ID}.
error.queryStatsUserInGuildByStat: An error occurred while querying users {STAT_KEY} in guild {GUILD_ID}.
error.queryStatsUserUpdateStat: An error occurred while updating user {USER_ID} stat {STAT_KEY} with {STAT_VALUE} in guild {GUILD_ID}.
error.queryStatsUserGetActivityStreak: An error occurred while querying user {USER_ID} activity and streak in guild {GUILD_ID}.
error.queryStatsUserSetActivityStreak: An error occurred while setting user {USER_ID} activity and streak in guild {GUILD_ID}.
error.queryStatsUserIncrementTotalJoins: An error occurred while incrementing total joins for user {USER_ID} in guild {GUILD_ID}.
error.queryStartTsUserInGuild: An error occurred while querying user {USER_ID} start timestamp in guild {GUILD_ID}.
error.queryStartTsUserInGuildByStat: An error occurred while querying users start timestamp in guild {GUILD_ID}.
error.queryStartTsSetTimestamp: An error occurred while setting timestamp {TIMESTAMP} for stat {STAT} and user {USER_ID} in guild {GUILD_ID}.
error.queryDailyStatsTotalUsersInGuildByStat: An error occurred while querying total users daily stats in guild {GUILD_ID} by stat {STAT_KEY}.
error.queryDailyStatsUserInGuildByStat: An error occurred while querying user {USER_ID} daily stats in guild {GUILD_ID} by stat {STAT_KEY}.
error.queryDailyStatsUpdateUser: An error occurred while updating user {USER_ID} daily stats in guild {GUILD_ID} by stat {STAT_KEY}.
